text: 11.23: Stt 19.24-28 naŋga, Ais 14.13-15Kaperneam hati narɨ ambandara, Arɨŋ Got tɨhuyahɨti nuŋandɨ pɨhuyɨ yawɨmɨndaŋ, vamba ambandara, manɨŋganzɨkwɨ. Hara narɨ kɨmuhɨmu ŋɨnɨŋɨndu upɨyɨ mɨŋgurɨmandɨra. Yi narɨ naŋga kɨta muhɨmɨmuhɨm nzihɨ sihɨrahin ŋgandara maña kru mumɨŋga uta Sodom ndahara sihɨrɨti, Sodom kɨyɨhi wɨsa.
